examples.example: 只要我们努力提升自己，就会有更多的机会去实现梦想。

translate.english: As long as we strive to improve ourselves, there will be more opportunities to realize our dreams.

examples.example: 这次的比赛给了大家一个展现自我的好机会。

translate.english: This competition gives everyone a good chance to show themselves.

examples.example: 生活中充满了各种机会，我们要善于把握，才能让自己不断进步。

translate.english: Life is full of all kinds of opportunities, and we should be good at seizing them in order to make ourselves continuously progress.
